alps_test.description: Switzerland and northern Italy. Small region for development and testing.
alps_test.notes: Covers Mont Blanc, Matterhorn, Jungfrau, Lake Geneva, Lake Como. ~278 km x 500 km.

europe.description: Full European continent. Iceland south coast to Urals, Mediterranean to North Africa coast.
europe.notes: SRTM3 90m resolution. ~44k√ó43k px master, ~7200 LOD0 chunks. Processing 10-30 min.
